
References

X TIPS
======

A-1. HERE'S HOW YOU CAN download Sphinx.

A-2. HERE'S HOW YOU CAN A1 DOWNLOAD SPHINX.

A-3. HERE'S HOW YOU CAN A3 DOWNLOAD SPHINX AND A3 DOWNLOAD SPHINX.

B-1. Docutils site and Sphinx site.

B-2. B1 DOCUTILS SITE AND B1 SPHINX SITE.

B-3. B2 SPHINX SITE AND B2 DOCUTILS SITE.

B-4. B4 SPHINX SITE AND B4 DOCUTILS SITE.

C-1. LINK TO Translation Tips SECTION.

C-2. LINK TO X TIPS SECTION.

C-3. LINK TO X TIPS SECTION.

C-4. LINK TO X TIPS x X TIPS SECTION.

C-5. LINK TO TRANS x LATION

D-1. LINK TO Translation Tips and Next Section SECTION.

D-2. LINK TO X TIPS AND N SECTION SECTION.

D-3. LINK TO N SECTION AND X TIPS SECTION.

D-4. LINK TO N SECTION AND X TIPS SECTION.

D-5. LINK TO Next AND Tips


N SECTION
=========
